lead_paragraph: Boston weapons dealer Eddie Coyle does not want to go to prison, but is equally unwilling to give up his lifestyle. So he continues to run guns for the underworld, but becomes an informant to the police and the treasury department as well. When the mob realize what he is doing, they send his best friend Dillon to kill him. Dillon takes Eddie to dinner and a hockey game, and then to a deserted location to rub him out.
